### Become an AP-LS Sponsor

Signing up as a Business Partner of AP-LS has never been easier. Select your sponsorship, upload your logo, register your staff and make a payment all in one place.

[Click here to register!](https://apls.memberclicks.net/2023_sponsor_exhibitor_form)

### Take-One Brochure Table

\$200 (One time fee)

For the benefit of those who do not, or cannot, rent a booth exhibit, a Take-One Brochure Table for the distribution of free brochures and other material is available to offer pamphlets, brochures, leaflets, cards, magazines, etc. This will be for paid Take-One Exhibitors ONLY. Other materials will be removed. Unused materials will not be returned.

### Branding opportunities

All targeted sponsorship opportunities come with acknowledgment at the conference.

\*Cost production not included in sponsorship

-   Tote Bags - \$2,000

### Sponsorship opportunities

All targeted sponsorship opportunities support the individual items or events selected.

Each opportunity is exclusive, so your organization will be featured prominently at each event.

-   **Conference Wi-Fi Sponsor -** \$8,000

-   **Welcome Reception Sponsor -** \$8,000

-   **Thursday Breaks (AM/PM) -** \$3,500

-   **Lunch Product Theatre (2 available - Fri or Sat) -** \$15,000 (Lunch not included in pricing

-   **Poster Session Reception (2 available - Fri or Sat) -** \$10,000

-   **Friday Breaks (AM/PM) -** \$3,500

-   **Saturday Breaks (AM/PM) -** \$2,000 :::
